1.0.name: wordpress/file-renaming-on-upload
1.0.description:
WordPress can't properly render files with accents and some special characters on file name (e.g., Brazilian, French, ...). This plugin renames files just before the upload moment so they can be exhibited without problems.

For now, you can choose these options:

  • Add Site url: Inserts "www.yoursite.com" at the beggining of the file name. Ex: yoursite.com_filename.jpg
  • Replace file name by datetime: Replaces filename by datetime, like "2013-07-18_21-48-19"
  • Lowercase: Converts all characters to lowercase
  • Remove accents
  • Remove special chars: Removes these special chars: ? + [ ] / \ = < > : ; , ' " & $ # * ( ) | ~ ` ! { }
